boardgame.name: La Clef
boardgame.description:
In Paris, Fable Table, famous puzzle creator, is organizing a test for his new escape-room. At the end of the evening, his dead body is found. They thought they had come to play and they found themselves in the middle of a crime scene...

—description from the publisher

La Clef ("The Key") is a murder-solving escape-room boardgame with a crime inside an escape-room.

boardgame.name: Twilight Imperium: Fourth Edition – Twilight Codex Volume III: Vigil
boardgame.description:
The Codex is a web-based publication that highlights rules updates and showcases new content for Twilight Imperium: Fourth Edition and its Prophecy of Kings expansion.

This volume includes:

6 Alternative Faction Leaders
1 Alternative Faction Mech
3 Alternative Secret Objective Cards
2 Alternative Alliance Reference Cards
3 Alternative Faction Reference Cards
6 Additional Frontier Cards

A BRAND NEW FACTION: The Council Keleres
ㅤ1 New Faction Sheet
ㅤ5 New Faction Leaders
ㅤ2 New Faction Technologies
ㅤ1 New Faction Mech
ㅤ1 New Faction Promissory Note
ㅤ2 New Legendary Planet Cards
ㅤ1 New Alliance Reference Card
ㅤ1 New Faction Reference Card

boardgame.name: Zombie Kittens
boardgame.description: Zombie Kittens is still the highly strategic, kitty-powered version of Russian Roulette that you love, but it introduces a brand new deck of cards so that your game doesn’t end just because you blow up. Only living players can win the game, but dead players now get to keep the cards in their hands when they explode. They also get to play certain cards to torment the living players. And they can even come back from the dead to win the game. Zombie Kittens can be played by itself or can be combined with Exploding Kittens.
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2022 UK Games Expo Best Variant Nominee
2022 UK Games Expo Best Variant People's Choice Award Winner

boardgame.name: Turns -n- Time
boardgame.description:
Turns -n- Time is a Mechanism from the World of Bedlam. A world where humanity has evolved beyond the need for morality and the individual is protected as a productive unit within The Society.

An approved Mechanism, Turns -n- Time ensures Compliant Conflict Resolution without appealing to superstitious concepts such as morality or justice from humanity’s primitive past.

Turns -n- Time is an In-Hand Game, in which players attempt to disable their opponents mechanism before their own is disabled through tactical choices across 3 registers (direction, action, and element).

boardgame.name: Sleeping Gods: Primeval Peril (Gamefound edition)
boardgame.description:
Sleeping Gods: Primeval Peril is a short standalone campaign for one or two players, set in the world of Sleeping Gods and using the same rules.

Primeval Peril is set on a dangerous river that winds through lush jungle. It includes new characters and stories so that nothing from the Sleeping Gods base game is spoiled.

It was first offered as a free print-and-play to all backers of the Sleeping Gods Kickstarter.

This first retail edition is revised and expanded with new stories and quests, streamlined gameplay, and an atlas with new maps.
Preliminary Components:

120+ cards
rulebook
storybook
Atlas
20 cardboard tokens
25 Damage tokens
20 Power tokens
5 character boards
1 Boat card and standee
Campaign map sheets
1 Combat die

boardgame.name: The Last Veggie
boardgame.description:
Winter is coming, so best start stockpiling your food! Whether it be through diligent collecting, immoral stealing, or charismatic trading, there’s no right or wrong way! Just survive!

The Last Veggie is a card game won by being the last remaining player with cards. As to how you obtain cards, that is up to the player. The game allows for passive players to simply draw and collect cards, aggressive players to readily steal cards, and strategic players to trade with others. Games go by quickly, so the winner is usually determined by whoever reaches a set number of games won (recommended 3 games). Build allies, play alone, be petty, do whatever you like. Just make sure that you are the last one standing at the end of the game!

—description from the publisher


Buy a copy at https://www.thegamecrafter.com/games/the-last-veggie

boardgame.name: Aeon Ready-Made Characters
boardgame.description:
Don’t wait, humanity needs you now!

Do you want to game but your players aren’t sure what to play? Looking for inspiration to get you into the world of Æon? This book is for you!

These six ready-made characters cover a range of psions eager to face whatever challenges your story brings. Each character is complete with background and roleplay suggestions. Or, if your players would prefer to explore something different, each character has alternative versions of the paths their lives may have taken. For Storyguides, every character also includes an antagonist character sheet so you can use them as foes, foils, or friends for the player’s own characters.

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Dark Alleys & Twisted Paths
boardgame.description:
Dark Alleys & Twisted Paths (13th Age Compatible) is a massive expansion book for all classes of the Core Book and 13 True Ways. You get a ton of new goodies, new races, new talents, new spells, new powers, new feats for every PC you can imagine, on over 240 pages.

My first 13th Age expansion book, Dark Pacts & Ancient Secrets, was all about expanding wide with new classes, but with this book I'm going back to the original 15 classes from Barbarian to Wizard to give you many new ways to create unique and interesting characters.

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Star Empires Compendium
boardgame.description:
The Star Empires Compendium lets your Starfinder Roleplaying Game heroes stake their claim as planetary princes and cosmic conquerors with extensive rules for founding colonies and forming an empire, with a flexible and modular system for territorial expansion on a single planet to interstellar empires that span multiple systems. From settlement modules to sprawling metropolises, balance law and corruption, industry and culture, prosperity and popularity to keep your citizens loyal and productive, engaging in trade, diplomacy, espionage, and more. Build armies and fleets to defend your shining capital or unleash mighty crusades to seize power from your rivals as you explore new worlds, uncover (or inspire) interplanetary conspiracies, and boldly gone where no one has gone before!

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Bookwalker
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




The game is still in active development, but a version of it has been made available to the public for purchase - Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between).




You’re a Bookwalker — a thief with an ability to dive into books. You are forced to use your powers to track and steal famous items like Thor’s Hammer and the Excalibur for clients, to regain your ability to write again.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Axes and Anvils Starter Deck
boardgame.description:
These beautiful cards will draw your players into their new characters and clan right away as the game starts before they even have characters. The Axes and Anvils Starter Deck puts cards in your hands for making dwarven characters and clans. Combat roles, skills, and Sayings of the Code bulid tough dwarves ready for adventure. Clan cards include descriptions of the five main overclans and Asset & Liability cards to flesh out your clan's unique history.

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Mythic Magazine (Volume 17 - Apr 2022)
boardgame.description:
User summary:

Content:

What If: Creative List Tips & Tricks
Tool Box: The Big Collection Of Big Examples

boardgame.name: Explorers
boardgame.description:
Scouts searching beyond the frontier. Scientists surveying unexplored worlds. Lost ships trying to find their way home. All are explorers, charting the unknown.

Explorers is a story supplement for the Uncharted Worlds roleplaying game which provides additional material on running exploration-based stories. It is intended to be used when the characters venture into unexplored territory. Explorers includes:


Advice on campaign setup
Rules for exploration jumps and surveying systems
“Across the void”, a quickstart for an exploration-focused campaign


Because the universe is a big place...

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Hallux Rigidus (2nd edition)
boardgame.description:
This is another release of the original with some alterations to improve various aspects of game play. Mainly we promised one of the characters could be the villain but with so many to choose from the statistics made it unlikely to happen so we reduced the number of characters to 6, the maximum number of players. Some possessions have been adjusted to conform better and certain wording improved for better in-play understanding without having to refer to the rule book.

Each person plays the role of a character that returns to Hallux Rigidus to gather evidence to discover the cause of the horrors that plague this small community. Once the cause is discovered, the players travel to the location in an attempt to end the horrors and save the town. The first player to successfully accomplish this, and retain his or her sanity, is the winner!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: For the Quest
boardgame.description:
For the Quest is a dungeon crawler game for 1-5 players aged 10+. In it, a group of four Heroes assist the wise Benor against the terrible forces of Nokron, the Lord of Shadows. These Adventurers will seek to repeat the feat of the past and undertake various missions to weaken the power of Nokron, which will do everything to not be overwhelmed as it was in the past.

The game is played in rounds, with each hero taking two actions per turn. Actions include searching rooms, using itens and using attacks to fight monsters. Then, Nokron gets to act and send its minions to fight the heroes.

Using a mix of old and new game mechanics, For The Quest is a homage for its -Quest like predecessors.

There are three ways to play FOR THE QUEST

Solo Hero: A player controls the group of four Heroes through the dungeon, facing the events that arise in each of the rooms according to the Quest Manual.

Group of Heroes: two to four players take on one Hero each, facing the events that arise in each of the rooms according to the Quest Manual.

Nokron, Lord of Shadows: Finally, the third form is with one of the players playing the role of Nokron, Lord of Shadows, while the others assume the role of Heroes. Nokron will seek to control its army of creatures and all sorts of traps and powers against the Heroes, seeking to prevent them from succeeding in their missions.

boardgame.name: Subtle Cypher Deck
boardgame.description:
Generate random cyphers on the fly for your modern, sci-fi, or other realistic game
Cyphers—single-use abilities that characters gain over the course of play—lie, not surprisingly, at the heart of the Cypher System. In many genres, cyphers come in the form of items, like magic potions, one-shot spell scrolls, or bits of alien technology.

But physical items with overt, supernatural-seeming effects don't fit every setting. Modern, historical, near-future science-fiction and similar genres demand realistic character abilities, and magic crystals or bizarre alien doohickies don't fit. These types of games use "subtle cyphers," which grant effects that are believable, minor, and not connected to physical items.

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Butterfly Garden Duel
boardgame.description:
Help save the butterflies! A city park has recently been zoned for development and you must help capture and relocate the endangered creatures.

Butterfly Garden Duel is a 1-2 player adaptation of Butterfly Garden. It is a "BYOP" game - "Bring Your Own Pencil" - so it is a print and play game that requires nothing other than the print-at-home sheets plus pencils.

In Butterfly Garden Duel, you compete with your opponent to spend time in the park collecting a variety of butterflies. You also need to make sure you have the right jars to hold them.

Each round, players pledge to commit time to the task and the player who commits more time has their choice of which park areas to capture butterflies from and, it usually means you can capture more. But, how much time you spend one day may limit your time on another, so you must carefully choose when to spend the most time.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Aethera Campaign Setting Field Guide I (5e)
boardgame.description:
Amazing Creatures of the Aethera System!

Take your 5E campaign across the universe and into the stars of the incredibly detailed Aethera Campaign Setting in this massive 204-page exploration of the planets of the Aethera system and the flora and fauna that inhabit them! Inside you'll discover dozens of new monsters ready for use. Each entry includes detailed 5th Edition statistics alongisde entries outlining creatures’ habitats and life cycles and how they fit into the cosmology of the Aethera System. It's not just about the monsters, though! You'll also find new types of gear, character options, and more!

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Tome of Spirits
boardgame.description:
The Endless Realm Tome of Spirits is your gateway to the Spirit Realm! This otherworldly tome is designed for Storytellers and Players alike! For Storytellers, The Tome of Spirits provides a wealth of information about spirits, and ways to incorporate them into your campaigns. We have done all the heavy lifting for you by providing you with adventure ideas, Spirit archetypes, and instructions for incorporating spirits into your campaigns. We’ve also included a number of ready-to-use spirit NPC’s, with fully fleshed-out backgrounds, stats, and roleplaying hints for them! If that doesn’t tickle your fancy, then how about having 20 fantastic premade religions and cults at your disposal, as well as ways to make your own corrupted cults? Want to take your players to the strange yet mystical Spirit Realm? Fear not! We have created an entire chapter dedicated to the Spirit Realm, and filled it with all kinds of locations for your players to explore.

For adventurers, this mighty Tome contains a plethora of magical items, rules for playing as a Spirit Campion (or Corrupted Champion), and of course…. More class paths!

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Phantom Ink: Extra Secert Objectives
boardgame.description:
A promo card for Phantom Ink that can be obtained by registering your game on the Resonym website.

Adds six new words:
Cookie
Chimney
Ribbon
Birthday
Reindeer
Vacation

boardgame.name: 18BF: The Big Four
boardgame.description:
18BF is a game in the 18xx series set in Great Britain.

A game of route building and running trains to make money. The player with the most assets (cash and share value) at the end wins.

Corporations start out small and grow into larger ones through growth, merger and/or acquisition. Then, later in the game, these larger corporations can merge to form systems: the "Big Four".

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Immer vorwärts
boardgame.description:
Each player gets 6 or 12 meeples (soldiers). The two neighboring player colors are allied. Movement is determined by the actual starting space of the soldier to be moved. The arrow shows the direction of movement and the numeral the number od spaces to move. The direction of movement may be changed after the first space.

A soldier may shoot an enemy soldier if he get on a space exactly matching the shooters range, which is also determined by the arrow and mumeral on the space the shooter is standing on. The players may not look at the numerals of the spaces occupied by enemy soldiers. The shooter moves to the space of the shot soldier, which is removed from play. If the enemy soldier stands on a space inside the shooters shooting range, the shooter moves to the space matching his shooting range, whereas the shot soldier stays on his space und gets a ring around his neck to indicate that he is wounded. If a wounded soldier get a second wound, he dies and is removed from the game.

Wounded soldiers have to move back to their starting spaces to recover from their wound. On their way back they ignore the arrows and may not shoot at enemy soldiers.

The party or player to get the most soldiers to their opponents starting spaces wins the game.

boardgame.name: OSICA
boardgame.description:
Osica is a Japanese trading card game which use many popular Japanese anime IP such as yurucamp, miss kobayashi's dragon maid and so on.
In this game, player will use a deck of their favorite charaters to catch the opponent's heart, the player who makes the opponent's heart to 0 and then directly attack the opponent will win the game.

boardgame.name: Age of Steam Deluxe: Expansion Volume I
boardgame.description:
A collection of Age of Steam Deluxe expansion maps:
- France / Poland
- Hungary / Finland
- New England / Switzerland / Pittsburgh
- Heavy Cardboard / Detroit Bankruptcy

Each Expansion Volume of the set contains multiple maps on mounted game boards, plus the rules and any extra components needed to play each one.
boardgame.boardgamecompilation: Age of Steam Deluxe Expansion: Detroit Bankruptcy & Heavy Cardboard Maps
Age of Steam Deluxe Expansion: France & Poland Maps
Age of Steam Deluxe Expansion: Hungary & Finland Maps
Age of Steam Deluxe Expansion: New England/Pittsburgh & Switzerland Maps

boardgame.name: Revita
boardgame.description:
In this fast paced twin-stick roguelite platformer, you play as an unnamed child ascending an ominous clocktower in pursuit of their lost memories. Harvest and sacrifice souls to grow your power in order to challenge procedural encounter rooms and intimidating bosses!

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Aeon's End: Legacy of Gravehold – Game Mat
boardgame.description: Neoprene area play mat with space for Xaxos outcast mat and ability deck/discard

boardgame.name: Pass Sanitaire
boardgame.description:
The mask is no longer mandatory, the places of life have reopened, the curfew is over and the summer holidays are fast approaching?

Let's go for the crazy adventure of the health pass! In this extension of the "état d'urgence" game, you will not only have to manage your game and avoid the twisted moves of your opponents, but also integrate the non-mandatory obligation to make your health pass before the 4th wave, which can arise at any time !

boardgame.name: Fast West
boardgame.description:
You know when in the middle of the far west someone pulls out a gun? Here, you are in the middle of the far west and someone pulled out a gun ...
Dodge, reload, use the revolver or the shotgun, keep your eyes on everyone to anticipate the moves and play your cards right to bring home the skin!

As fast as the speed and immediacy of this card game: everyone plays a card, everyone turns it, the shooting starts and all hell breaks loose!

West as the wild place without rules, full of twists, timeless phrases and duels in which we all at least once wanted to participate ... all that remains is to choose your gunfighter, take up the revolver and jump into the fray!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Jiggles & Wiggles
boardgame.description: This is a folded map in an envelope. The map has two cardboard sections glued to a map which is 8 panels by 3 and measuers nearly 30" x 16". It folds well and the cardbooard bits protect the edges of your poster-map.

boardgame.name: Snowy Scenes
boardgame.description:
Back of Envelope

Within this worthless package, you will find two different tables of encounter ideas suitable for most fantasy roleplaying games. None of the work is actually useful, but it is possible that some if will inspire you and lead to adventure.

This collection of encounter ideas was created by Philip Reed and it is entirely his fault that paper and ink were wassteing in the making of the map-like RPG supplement.

boardgame.name: Dungeons Useless Ideas
boardgame.description:
Back of Envelope

You thought that you could always use new dungeon encounter ideas? Well, this worthless collection of words and images -- a total waste of paper -- is here to demonstrate why more isn't always a good thing!

Tables of bade ideas await if you're foolish enough to open this useless work and waste time reading the words hidden behind the covers.

Don't waste your time or money.

boardgame.name: Mimics An Unnecessary Work
boardgame.description:
Back of Envelope

Open this map-sized RPG expansion if you dare to reveal a selection of completely worthless tools to reach for when you decide to introduce the bizarre mimic to your next game session. You don't this! Skip this and save your cash!

boardgame.name: Zenith: The Last City
boardgame.description:
The world of Zenith crawls with monsters that have been empowered by a dark and mysterious god -- but glory and treasures await those brave enough to unveil Zenith's mysteries.
Experience action-packed combat as you battle monsters that know how to dodge your blows and respond with ferocity. Forge alliances in guilds, join epic raids and world events, and blaze a path to become the most powerful Agent Zenith has ever known.

Features:
- Explore an ever expanding massive open world through flying, climbing, ziplining, and even swimming!
- Discover a deep combat system that takes both time and practice to master -- shoot, swing, and cast your way to glory.
- Synthesize powerful items using the spoils of battle and enhance them to become a legendary Agent.
- Discover the joy of cooking -- learn delicious recipes, gather ingredients, and share them with your friends.
- Play together -- conquer Zenith’s greatest challenges, including epic boss battles, public events and dungeons.

Source: The Publisher Website.

boardgame.name: Ultrawings 2
boardgame.description:
Ultrawings is back and its bigger and better than before! Return to the skies in 5 all-new aircraft as you complete hundreds of missions across a beautifully stylized, island-theme world!

MOTION CONTROLS!

Our ground-breaking motion control system returns! Use your virtual hands to fully interact and control your aircraft.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge
boardgame.description:
Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge is an action-adventure experience where you’ll take on the role of a droid repair technician operating near the Outer Rim. When a group of pirates attack you on Batuu, you’ll discover that anyone in the galaxy can become a hero.

Fight alongside classic characters like R2-D2 and C-3PO, and take on unexpected alliances and deadly enemies. Visit Seezelslak in his cantina to pick up missions that will take you into the wilds of Batuu — or become part of his legendary tales.

Continue your story in Last Call*, the new add-on adventure in the Outer Rim. Enjoy new tales, eras and places in this epic conclusion.

The experience takes place on the outskirts of Black Spire Outpost on the planet of Batuu, as depicted in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, the immersive epic lands at Disneyland Resort in California and Walt Disney World Resort in Florida.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: The Origin
boardgame.description:
From the publisher web site:

Master perilous new powers in a world that is dangerously askew!

In 2017, Oumuamua made headlines as the first interstellar object ever detected passing through our solar system. Everyone remembers that. A web search will tell you all about it.

So why doesn’t anyone remember Nibiru? How it curved out of the night, its trajectory changing so rapidly that scientists could barely track it. How its arc altered, day by day, inexorably toward our own. How the skies blazed when it struck the Earth. How the seas boiled, and the cities burned.

Except the cities still stand, the sky is unburnt, and only an unlucky few of us have nightmares about Nibiru. Maybe we’re losing our minds. Sharing a delusion. And that newfound ability—to turn invisible, to read thoughts, to levitate—is just another shared delusion.

So why are we being hunted down?

The Origin is a gritty and mysterious setting in which characters master emerging superpowers as they face nefarious groups, superpowered opponents, and dark forces somehow connected to memories of a world that met a different fate. The Origin includes:


A mysterious backstory for PCs to piece together: a world that looks at first identical to our own, but has been altered—somehow—in dark and frightening ways.
Rules for PCs to gain and master shocking new abilities over the course of play.
Dozens of new cyphers and artifacts.
Dozens of new monstrous creatures, extradimensional beings, and weird metahumans.
Three full adventures, plus one adventure interlude, that draw characters into the discovery and mastery of their powers, and introduce the sinister forces arrayed against them—and the entire world!


A setting and supplement for the Cypher System. Requires the Cypher System Rulebook for play.

boardgame.name: Infantry Attacks: Franz Josef's Armies
boardgame.description:
An expansion book for Infantry Attacks: Fall of Empires adding the national armies (plus the tough Bosniaken regiments recruited in Bosnia-Hercegovina) to the campaign’s story. There are 28 new scenarios plus ten “battle games” linking together these scenarios plus those from Fall of Empires to tell the story of the 1914 campaign in Galicia.

Also includes 264 new die-cut and silky-smooth pieces adding the troops, weapons and leaders of the Landwehr, Honvédség and Bosniaken to the game.

Not a complete game. You’ll need Fall of Empires and August 1914 to enjoy the scenarios.

-description from publisher's website

boardgame.name: 50mm Magnetic Stilts
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
50mm Magnetic Stilts is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. It is made of "Dwarvenite” and magnetized metal. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

50mm Magnetic Stilts comes with eight 50mm Stilts.

boardgame.name: Threshold of Worlds
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Threshold of Worlds is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. It is special edition set made of resin and comes fully painted. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

Threshold of Worlds comes with these 5 pieces:
(1) Threshold Crag - Life Domain
(1) Threshold Crag - Death Domain
(1) Druid Statue
(1) Archaean Monument
(1) Planar Vortex

boardgame.name: Moonlit Arch
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Moonlit Arch is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. It is special edition set made of resin and comes fully painted. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

Moonlit Arch comes with these 3 pieces:
(1) Moonlit Arch
(2) Griffin Pillar

boardgame.name: Forest Battleboards - Megapack (w/grid)
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Forest Battleboards – Megapack (w/grid) is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. The battle boards are 11mm thick making them the same height as the sculpted terrain pieces. The surface is a printed artwork of the terrain with a ferrous metal sheet beneath it so the magnetic pieces can stick to it. The flip side of the board holds four embedded anchor magnets designed to hold the Dwarven Forge terrain trays. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

Forest Battleboards – Megapack (w/grid) comes with these 9 Forest Patchy Ground 12x12 (w/grid) boards.

boardgame.name: Mountain Battleboards - Megapack (w/grid)
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Mountain Battleboards – Megapack (w/grid) is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. The battle boards are 11mm thick making them the same height as the sculpted terrain pieces. The surface is a printed artwork of the terrain with a ferrous metal sheet beneath it so the magnetic pieces can stick to it. The flip side of the board holds four embedded anchor magnets designed to hold the Dwarven Forge terrain trays. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

Mountain Battleboards – Megapack (w/grid) comes with these 9 Mountain Patchy Ground 12x12 (w/grid) boards.

boardgame.name: Erinthor Mountain Terrain Tray - Single (w/ GRID)
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Erinthor Mountain Terrain Tray - Single (w/ GRID) is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. Terrain trays are made of thin ferrous metal sheet so the magnetic pieces can stick to it. Different terrain artwork printed on the surface of each side. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

Erinthor Mountain Terrain Tray - Single (w/ GRID) comes with 1 Mountain Ground / Packed Earth 12x12 (w/grid).

boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Dreadhollow Forest Terrain Tray - Single (w/ GRID) is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. Terrain trays are made of thin ferrous metal sheet so the magnetic pieces can stick to it. boardgame.name: Textured Swamp Water Terrain Tray - Single (w/ GRID)
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Textured Swamp Water Terrain Tray - Single (w/ GRID) is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. Terrain trays are made of thin ferrous metal sheet so the magnetic pieces can stick to it. Different terrain artwork printed on the surface of each side. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

Textured Swamp Water Terrain Tray - Single (w/ GRID) comes with 1 Swamp Water / Dismal Quagmire 12x12 (w/grid)

boardgame.name: Raging River Terrain Tray - 2 pack (w/ GRID)
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Raging River Terrain Tray - 2 pack (w/ GRID) is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. Terrain trays are made of thin ferrous metal sheet so the magnetic pieces can stick to it. Different terrain artwork printed on the surface of each side. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

Raging River Terrain Tray - 2 pack (w/ GRID) comes with these 2 pieces.

boardgame.rpgitemversion: Raging River Terrain Tray - 2 pack (w/ GRID)

boardgame.name: Stilts Megapack
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Stilts Megapack is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. It is made of "Dwarvenite” and magnetized metal. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter. The item comes in both painted and unpainted versions.

Stilts Megapack comes with these 44 pieces:
(16) 50mm Stilt (No Paint)
(12) 12mm Stilt
(16) 38mm Stilt

boardgame.name: 38mm & 12mm Stilts
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
38mm & 12mm Stilts is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. It is made of "Dwarvenite” and magnetized metal. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter. The item comes in both painted and unpainted versions.

38mm & 12mm Stilts comes with these 16 pieces:
(8) 12mm Stilt
(8) 38mm Stilt

boardgame.name: Occult Philosophy Spell Cards: Air to Demonology
boardgame.description:
Become the Master of Magic!

Occult Philosophy brought an explosive selection of spells, paths, and more to Shadow of the Demon Lord games. Now, with the Occult Philosophy Spell Cards series, you can bring the magic to your tables, with the spells presented on digital cards for ease of use. This pack includes all the spells from the Air, Alchemy, Alteration, Arcana, Battle, Celestial, Chaos, Conjuration, Curse, Death, and Demonology traditions.

boardgame.name: Forest Battleboards - 2 Pack
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Forest Battleboards - 2 Pack is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. The battle boards are 11mm thick making them the same height as the sculpted terrain pieces. The surface is a printed artwork of the terrain with a ferrous metal sheet beneath it so the magnetic pieces can stick to it. The flip side of the board holds four embedded anchor magnets designed to hold the Dwarven Forge terrain trays. They come in gridded and gridless versions. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

Forest Battleboards - 2 Pack comes with these 2 Forest Patchy Ground 12x12 boards.

boardgame.name: Texture Mat - Swamp Water 24" x 24"
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Texture Mat - Swamp Water 24" x 24" is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. The texture mat is a vinyl mat printed with terrain art on one side and coated with a clear water texture. The texture mat cam in grided and gridless versions. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

boardgame.name: Texture Mat - Mountain Lake 24" x 24"
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Texture Mat - Mountain Lake 24" x 24" is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. The texture mat is a vinyl mat printed with terrain art on one side and coated with a clear water texture. The texture mat cam in grided and gridless versions. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Texture Mat - Dismal Quagmire 24" x 24" is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. The texture mat is a vinyl mat printed with terrain art on one side and coated with a clear water texture. The texture mat cam in grided and gridless versions. This item was initially available as an add-on during the Wildlands Kickstarter.

boardgame.name: Wildlands Untamed
boardgame.description:
User Summary:
Wildlands Untamed is part of the Wildlands wilderness terrain series. It is made of "Dwarvenite" and includes some metal and magnetized parts. Some parts have LED circuitry (switch, battery, and socket) to support LED lighting attachments. This item was initially available as a pledge level during the Wildlands Kickstarter. The item comes in both painted and unpainted versions.

Wildlands Untamed essentially consists of all three of the mega build sets: Titanstooth Glade[/rpgitem], Wyverstone Peak[/rpgitem], and Sorrow Isle[/rpgitem].

Wildlands Untamed comes with these 879 pieces:
(2) Floating Log
